name: Laranjos Adventure
description:
Hi... this is my first game, so if you find any bugs, don't worry, I'm very happy to participate in this game jam, really I learned a lot about programming, and I made this game with my friend learning something new like me... so.

The game is about this orange, who really wants a coxinha, but to be able to buy it, he must venture into the alleys to get the money, and fulfill his dream and leave the alleys with a warm coxinha
